Title: Mindhunters
Overview: Trainees in the FBI's psychological profiling program must put their training into practice when they discover a killer in their midst.  Based very loosely on Agatha Christie's And Then There Were None.
Tagline: For seven elite profilers, finding a serial killer is a process of elimination. Their own.
production_companies: Avenue Pictures Productions, Weed Road Pictures, Intermedia Films, Egmond Film & Television, Dimension Films, Outlaw Productions (I), Mindhunters (UK) Limited, Mindhunters Productie BV, Tonna Oy, Outlaw Victoria Productions Inc.
Cast: LL Cool J, Jonny Lee Miller, Kathryn Morris
